description: This file defines a React functional component 'ContentBuilder' that provides an interface for instructors to edit lesson content, including managing modules, lessons, and their associated content like video URL, markdown, and HTML. It interacts with external helper functions for fetching and saving data and utilizes UI components for rendering.

methods.name: ContentBuilder()
methods.description: Main React component for building and editing course lesson content, handling state initialization, data loading, user interactions, and saving content.

methods.name: loadLessons
methods.description: Fetches lessons for a specific module and resets the form for editing.

methods.name: onSelectLesson
methods.description: Handles selection of a lesson, populating the form with its current content.

methods.name: onChange
methods.description: Creates a handler for updating form fields based on user input.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Saves the current form content for the selected lesson via an external helper.
